name: Retro Style
description:
Retro Style is a rhythm game, that uses the cool music of retro nostalgic games, this is a test version, i publish a test version for not seem like i'm dead, so, here is.

Test Version: No background animation, Can't win or lose, other things

more information: readme.txt and changelog.txt

If you win a song, then, Press ESC because you can't win or lose

This game is for the Noblinjam game jam

#NOBLINJAM
